short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finexo PMS Login Extension allows CA and Tax Professionals to login into Client's Accounts in GST and Income Tax Portals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto-sync between multiple computers.

You have to subscribe to Finexo PMS to use this extension. You can sign up from this link - https://pms.finexo.in/signup

Finexo PMS is a full-fledged practice management software for Chartered Accountants and Tax Professionals. Subscribers of Finexo PMS can also use this extension to login in client's account. Know more at https://finexo.in/practice-mangement-software-for-ca-tax-practitioners

After installing this extension, you will get a small popup on login pages of these portals. You just need to select the client and the client's username and password will be auto-filled, if added in Finexo PMS. So, you need not type it every time. 

Finexo PMS has the following features:-

1) Just enter GSTIN and all details such as Client Name, Trade Name, Registration Date etc will be fetched from GSTN.

2) Get return status of a client in one click directly from GSTN.

3) Create return task for all clients in one click. 

4) See the task status of all clients on one page.

5) Chat with your team members. (Coming soon)
